name: Miss Rosy Mansoor
greetingText: I really love uh and iloveuhalot!
wishText: Today is a special day, not just because it's my jaan's birthday, but because it marks another year of your amazing existence in this world. I feel so blessed to be a part of your life, and to have the privilege of celebrating this special day with uh, even if we are physically apart ;)Janma Din ko subhakamna
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to uh!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the sexy ass...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
